Reviews.Title: It is good phone but could be even better.
Reviews.Author: Oleg
Reviews.Content: + Quite long battery lasts.- If you keep it in bag then quite often it is beeping because it is tries to UnLock keyboard. LCD start to light on (reduce battery life)- No support from manufacture.- No choice of phone background (them). In my case I have white phone and pink (!) background..  ;o)+ All necessary phone features it is has.= In general I'm happy by phone. It is very good ratio: Quality/Price

Reviews.Title: Have retured for the accessory plug.
Reviews.Author: Yu Wang
Reviews.Content: This phone itself is okey.But I have retured for the accessory plug. The return sevise of Amazon is pretty good.

ProductInfo.Name: BLU Diva X T372T Unlocked GSM Phone with Dual SIM, 1.3MP Camera + LED Flash, Blu
